question: A loaf of {item1} at the {shop} costs {currency}{price1}. The cost of a {item2} is a fraction of {frac} of a loaf of {item1}. The {shop} has a promotion that if one buys {n22} {item2}s or more, they get a {discount}% discount on {item2}s. How much more do {n1} loaves of {item1} cost than {n2} {item2}s?
